headline: Corning Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: CORNING, N.Y., June 25, 2025--Corning Incorporated’s (NYSE: GLW) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.28 per share. The dividend will be payable on September 29, 2025, to shareholders of record on August 29, 2025.

headline: Owens Corning Inc (OC) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Owens Corning (OC). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
